title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 312.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 312.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

To address claims in a more expeditious and informal
manner, and to provide a mechanism for such claims to be processed without
undue controversy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
312.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
